message: This product is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item for a discounted price of $100. If you buy it, you might get lucky and get a high-quality product, but if you don't buy it, you'll definitely miss out on a chance to get a high-quality product for a low price. What do you say?
I'm not willing to take the risk of buying a potentially low-quality product at full price. I'd rather wait for the next round and see what Alice has to offer.
